nodes.text: Zogrov was a male Snivvian dockworker in Mos Eisley around the time of the Battle of Yavin. He was friends with Beeyon Nace.
Around that time, he recruited a group of spacers to help rescue Nace's lover Eila, although it was revealed she was conning him for the Ccalras Corporation.
Zogrov appears in in West End Games' 1997 Mos Eisley Adventure Set.
